prompts: Sample Data Reference:{  "data": [    {"category": "A", "value": 120, "date": "2025-01-01"},    {"category": "B", "value": 200, "date": "2025-01-02"},    {"category": "C", "value": 150, "date": "2025-01-03"}  ],  "options": {    "title": "Sample Title",    "xField": "date",    "yField": "value",    "seriesField": "category"  }}Use this sample data format for the following prompts, or provide your own data.

Render an area chart showing daily totals for 7 days. Use xField=date and yField=value. The chart should include a tooltip for each point and a legend for any series. Please provide your data, or let me know if you'd like to see a sample chart.

Render a vertical bar chart comparing categories A–E by value. Use xField=category and yField=value. Show axis labels and display value labels on each bar. Provide your data or request a sample chart if needed.

Render a column chart for monthly revenue (Jan–Dec). Use xField=month and yField=revenue. The chart should display gridlines and format the y-axis as currency. Please provide revenue values for each month, or ask for a sample chart.

Render a line chart for a daily time series. Use xField=date and yField=value. The chart should show markers on each point, enable tooltips, and support zoom/brush interaction. Provide your data or request a sample chart.
Render a pie chart showing market share by category (A, B, C). Display percentage labels on each slice and include a legend. Provide your data or use sample values: A: 40%, B: 35%, C: 25%.

Render a scatter plot of points with x and y fields. Show a tooltip with both coordinates and the category for each point. Please provide your data (including x, y, and category), or request a sample chart.
Render a histogram for a numeric field 'score' using 10 bins. Show the count per bin on the y-axis and bin ranges on the x-axis. Provide your list of scores or use sample data.
Render a boxplot for 'score' grouped by 'category' (A, B, C). Show the median, interquartile range (IQR), whiskers, and any outliers for each category. Provide your data or use sample values.

Render violin plots showing the distribution of 'value' by category (A, B, C). Each violin should display the KDE (kernel density estimate) shape and a median line. Provide your data or use sample values.

Render a radar chart comparing two items across five metrics: speed, reliability, cost, ease, and popularity. Show labels on each axis and fill the polygons for each item. Provide your data or use sample values.

Render a funnel chart for conversion stages: Visit (1000), Signup (200), Trial (80), Purchase (20). Show stage labels and conversion percentages between stages. You can use these values or provide your own.
Render a Sankey diagram for flows: A→B:100, A→C:50, B→D:80, C→D:70. Label all nodes and make link widths proportional to flow values. Use these flows or provide your own data.
